title: Jingle bells. T'was the night before Christmas
brief_description: Two wonderful animated Christmas stories: “Jingle bells”: the annual village sleigh race is on and Tom and George compete for the affection of Miss Fanny Bright. The classic story of “T’was the night before Christmas” where everyone is asleep except the house mouse who sees St. Nicholas arrive with presents for everyone, including cheese.
